workflowSection.title: What Saras Tracks and Manages for You
workflowSection.subtitle: From ROC filings to tax returns and labor law requirements, Saras brings structure, automation, and audit readiness to your compliance universe.

workflows.title: ROC & Company Law Compliance
steps: Auto-schedule annual filings like MGT-7, AOC-4, and DIR-3 KYC based on incorporation date
Assign preparation and approval roles using Maker-Checker flow
Attach supporting board resolutions and auditor reports
Auto-flag overdue filings and escalate to HOD

workflows.title: GST & Indirect Tax Compliance
steps: Track GSTR-1, GSTR-3B, GSTR-9, and state-specific return deadlines
Pull reconciliation data or link challans for audit evidence
Auto-remind for payment due dates with workflow for approval before submission
Highlight mismatch in input-output credits across months

workflows.title: Income Tax & TDS Compliance
steps: Create workflows for monthly TDS payments and quarterly 26Q/24Q returns
Auto-assign PAN-wise challan uploads and validations
Send alerts for missed Form 16 or Form 15CA/CB compliance
Track corporate income tax return timelines and dependencies

workflows.title: Labor Law & Statutory Registrations
steps: Maintain centralized tracker for PF, ESI, Shops & Establishment, PT, and LWF filings
Assign HR/Payroll teams to complete, review, and attach proof of payment
Alert management for missing registration renewals or threshold breaches (e.g. PF crossing limits)
Record inspection notices or correspondence for compliance history

workflows.title: Internal Policies & Compliance Certifications
steps: Auto-schedule internal reviews of policies like POSH, Whistleblower, and Data Protection
Assign responsibility for annual compliance declarations or training
Link circulars, regulatory guidelines, and internal communication for traceability
Generate internal compliance scorecard for CXOs and audit committees
